content.rendered:
Product / Credit & Debit Processing

Top credit card merchant processing services in Los Angeles

No matter how your business takes payments, Dynamic Merchant Solutions is your go-to credit card processing company in Los Angeles.

Free Quote
Contact Sales

We make it easy for you to accept credit and debit cards, no matter where you do business. From eCommerce, to retail, to professional services, and more, we’ve got you covered.

Integrate our payment processing with your existing tools.

Contact Sales

Small businesses trust Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

Leading credit card payment processing.

Low rates, industry-leading customer service, and marketing services make us the best credit card processing company in Los Angeles. 

When you need debit and credit card payment processing, we can help you get approved and set up quickly, so you can start making sales.

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
In-Person (Average)
1.92%+8¢
Average PIN-Debit Rate 0.91% +8¢

Keyed & Online (Average)

2.38%+25¢

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Mikaela Stone

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Chris Mathew

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Start Selling with

Dynamic Merchant
Solutions.

Request a free quote from a top merchant payment
service in Los Angeles.

Apply now and get
approved as soon as 24
hours.
